page.title: 05DAINTIFYT FACTORY LIMAVADY 1
page.content: WHY WAS THE FACTORY OPENED IN LIMAVADY? The factory was set up by{two {Hungarian Jews}who fled to London due to persecution in 1938. Due to wartime bombing they moved to Belfast in 1940 and then to Cookstown, Co Tyrone in 1942. In 1954, they decided to expand their business and were attracted to Limavady because of{high {government grants}and the{availability {of labour}in this area of high unemployment. The present owners {Courtaulds}bought it in 1972. RAW MATERIALS The raw materials are bought from several countries. {Lace}and{elastic are bought from England and France, {embroidery}from Switzerland and {fabrics}from Japan.
